trans-unit.source: Execute the following command for to use the ae.kivy_app module in your application. It will install ae.kivy_app into your python (virtual) environment:
trans-unit.target: 执行以下命令,在您的应用程序中使用ae.kivy_app模块。它将把ae.kivy_app安装到你的python(虚拟)环境中。

trans-unit.source: If you instead want to contribute to this portion then first fork the ae_kivy_app repository at GitLab, then pull it to your machine and finally execute the following command in the root folder of this repository (ae_kivy_app):
trans-unit.target: 如果您想贡献这部分，请首先 在GitLab上存储ae_kivy_app存储库，然后将其拉到您的计算机上，最后在该存储库的根文件夹（ae_kivy_app）中执行以下命令：

trans-unit.source: More info on the features and usage of this portion are available at ReadTheDocs.
trans-unit.target: 有关该部分的功能和用法的更多信息，请访问 ReadTheDocs。

trans-unit.source: The last command will install this module portion into your virtual environment, along with the tools you need to develop and run tests or for to extend the portion documentation. For to contribute only to the unit tests or the documentation of this portion replace the setup extras key dev in the above command with tests or docs respectively.
trans-unit.target: 最后一条命令将把该模块部分以及开发和运行测试或扩展部分文档所需的工具安装到您的虚拟环境中。为了仅有助于单元测试或本部分的 docs 分别用 tests 或文档替换上述命令中的setup extras key dev 。

trans-unit.source: The portions (modules and sub-packages) of the Application Environment for Python are within the ae namespace and are providing helper methods and classes for to develop full-featured applications with Python.
trans-unit.target: Python应用程序环境的各个部分（模块和子包）位于 ae 命名空间内，并提供了用于使用Python开发功能齐全的应用程序的辅助方法和类。

trans-unit.source: ae_kivy_app portion of python application environment namespace package
trans-unit.target: ae_kivy_app部分的python应用环境命名空间包。

trans-unit.source: kivy_app portion of ae namespace package
